name: Cleopatra's Pyramid
description:
There's a new Pyramid rising in the desert - Cleopatra's Pyramid! If you like classic Solitaire and Pyramid card games, you'll love this one!

Cleopatra's Pyramid combines an incredibly captivating gameplay, 212 exciting levels (easily unlocked via In-App Purchase of Scarabs or downloading other apps for free), and probably the most beautiful card game artwork you've ever seen on the App Store! After each completed stage, you'll be awarded a beautiful stone that you can use to create your very own Pyramid! This game is highly recommended to all fans of card, board and puzzle games.

MANY HOURS OF SOLITAIRE FUN

Cleopatra's Pyramid is a beautifully illustrated adaptation of the classic Solitaire card game. Your task is to clear all the cards with the least moves as possible. This may sound easy, but it can prove to be a real challenge in this long playing skill game.

COOL FEATURE

Are you using an iPhone 4 or newer or an iPad 2? Then check out this cool gyroscope enabled feature. Launch the application and from the main menu, hold your device in both hands and turn 180 degrees while watching the sun rises and sets upon Cleopatra’s Pyramid! Pretty nifty!

KEY FEATURES OF CLEOPATRA'S PYRAMID

* Hours of card game fun with this exciting Solitaire variation
* 212 different levels combined in 124 stages (unlocked via In-App Purchase of Scarabs or downloading other apps for free)
* Beautiful Egyptian artwork with full Retina display support
* Build your very own pyramids and unlock more than 40 special decorative items
* Game Center leaderboards and achievements
* Interactive menus

IMPORTANT: All free or purchased Scarabs are restricted to this installation only. Uninstalling the application will result in the loss of these Scarabs. Scarabs are non-refundable and cannot be transferred to any other devices.
